// Sky is the limit
// Codechef peer problem

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <vector>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;

int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	
	vector<int> v1, v2;
	int p,q;
	while(t--){
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int a[n][n];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++){
				cin>>a[i][j];
			}
		}
		bool colEven, rowEven = true;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
			int rowSum=0;
			int colSum=0;
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++){
				rowSum +=a[i][j];
				colSum +=a[j][i];
			}
			if(rowSum%2 !=0){
				v1.push_back(rowSum%2);
				if(v1.size()==2)
					break;
				p=i;
			}
				
			if(colSum%2 !=0){
				v2.push_back(colSum%2);
				if(v2.size()==2)
					break;
				q=i;
			}
			
		}
				
		if(v1.size() == 0 && v2.size() == 0)
			cout<<"1"<<endl;
		else if(v1.size() ==1 && v2.size()==1){
			cout<<"("<<p+1<<","<<q+1<<")"<<endl;
		}
		else
			cout<<"0"<<endl;
		v1.clear();
		v2.clear();
	}
	
	return 0;
}
